title: Evelyn Evelyn - A Tragic Tale in Two Tomes
description:
'Evelyn Evelyn - A Tragic Tale in Two Tomes'

Dark Horse Books, 2011, 144 pages

Written by Amanda Palmer, Jason Webley

Illustrated by Cynthia von Buhler

Enthusiasts of genuine tragedy and celebrity intrigue, gird your mental loins for an authentic tale of unbelievable hardship and epic catastrophe! This wholly true and accurate account details the extraordinary lives of Evelyn and Evelyn, a darling but unfortunate pair of conjoined twins who brave extreme circumstances of calamity and adversity, such as the bizarre and bloody night of their birth and subsequent orphaning; their early years on a chicken farm; shocking encounters with depraved gentlemen; life in the circus; the terrible fates of their dearest friends; and concluding with the sisters' rise to international fame via the internet. Includes an afterword by award-winning author Neil Gaiman.
